pages.text: If you right-click any Planks block while sneaking, you can turn the block into a Ritual Brazier, which is needed to perform rituals.
Moon Crystals can be used in several recipes, and will be very useful later on. For now, it can be used to craft Weather Idols and transmutation rituals.
Moon Berries are edible food items that can also be planted and grow from vines.$(br2)The berry can also be used to craft $(l:hexalia:resources/crops)Moon Berry Cookies$().
Moon Crystal Blocks serves as decoration or can be used as way to compact and store Moon Crystals. This block will have an important usage in the future.
